title: Chunky chilli chicken soup
time: Takes 15 minutes to make, 40 minutes simmering
description: This chilli chicken soup is nutritious and packed with flavour. Serve with cheddar and soured cream.
ingredients: 6 free-range boneless, skinless chicken thighs, chopped
400g tin kidney beans, drained and rinsed
Good grating of cheddar and dollop of soured cream to serve

method.Step 1: Fry the onion in a little oil in a deep saucepan for 10 minutes, stirring now and then. Add the garlic, cumin seeds, ground coriander, ground cinnamon, cayenne pepper and chillies. Add the chicken pieces and stir to coat in the spices.

method.Step 2: Pour in the chopped tomatoes and chicken stock, season well and bring to a simmer. Simmer for 20 minutes, then add the kidney beans and simmer for 10 more minutes.

method.Step 3: Serve with a good grating of cheddar and a dollop of soured cream.
